brands.name: BearPaw River
brands.description: BPR is a microbrewery based in Wasilla, dedicated to making classic hand-crafted beers.

brands.name: Goose Island
brands.description: Goose Island Brewery is a Chicago brewery that makes a number of IPAs, both seasonal and year-round

brands.name: Olentangy River
brands.description: ORBC is a newcomer that offers rich lagers and a wide selection of craft beers

brands.name: Solera
brands.description: Solera Brewery is based out of Parkdale, Oregon and has a passion for creating delicious beers

brands.name: Southern Tier
brands.description: Southern Tier, out of Lakewood, New York, makes a strong line of craft brews

brands.name: Mt Hood
brands.description: Based in the Pacific Northwest, Mt Hood has distinctive ales made with pure glacial water
